name: Crossy Barrier Dash - Reckless Road Rush Block 3 Free Edition
name_original: Crossy Barrier Dash - Reckless Road Rush Block 3 Free Edition
description:
The RUSH is on its way, last chance to save Your Block World!!
Get this app and be the voxel penguin hero!

Invite your friends beat them and share your progress!
Can you unlock all the cute figures?

Features:
> 3D Blocky Voxel graphics
> CRASHING action!
> Tons of unlockable cute characters
> Hours of fun!

Please drop a review!
